models.name: todo_list_configurations
models.description: System configuration entity that defines foundational application settings and behavior for the todo list application. This table stores critical system parameters that control the application's operation and user experience. Users directly manage these configurations through the interface.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Configuration title that describes the purpose of this setting. Represents the human-readable identifier for the configuration.

plainFields.name: completed
plainFields.description: Indicates whether the configuration is active or pending. True means the configuration is complete and enabled, false means it's inactive or in draft state.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this configuration was created. Used for audit trails and chronological ordering.

models.name: todo_list_user
models.description: User identity and authentication information, but not a person but a **connection** basis. This entity represents users across the system, including their authentication details and basic profile information. Used for all user-related operations including login, profile management, and access control.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: User's email address for login and notifications.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Securely hashed password for authentication. Never store plain text passwords.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: User's current status (e.g., active, suspended, pending). Used for access control and workflow.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was soft-deleted. Null indicates active account.

models.name: todo_list_tasks
models.description: Main entity representing individual todo items. Each task has a unique identifier, a title for user identification, a boolean status to track completion, and a timestamp for when it was created. This model serves as the primary business entity for task management, supporting all core operations including creation, completion, and persistence across sessions.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Task title as entered by the user. Represents the primary identifier of the task in the user interface.

plainFields.name: completed
plainFields.description: Current completion status of the task. Indicates whether the task has been completed by the user.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the task was created. Used for sorting tasks by creation order and provides audit trail for task management.
